account.descriptionLink:
Main purpose of this proposal is creating a new series of articles (6  planned) containing step by step  visualized explanations on how to use  Mean dApp.
The related objectives are;  

*Increasing Mean dApp user’s awareness.

*Attracting new users of Mean dApp through articles promotion on Twitter.  

Total budget is 6000 MEAN and  will be transfered to Play-Guild account and be distributed to whom create the best content.

For details : https://next.meanfi.com/p/proposal-creating-new-how-to-content-for-mean-dapp

Since Play-Guild account has 2881 sMEAN staked which is currently worth 3588 MEAN, the amount is to be transfered will be 2500 MEAN.
account.name: Creating new ‘How to…’ content for Mean dApp

account.descriptionLink:
Due to an administrative oversight, the Solanium stream for their advisory role to the DAO was never initiated when it should have been on June 28th, 2022. 
The Solanium team made us aware, and upon verification, it is clear we didn't initiate their 36-month vested stream for 525k MEAN. This proposal is to approve the release of these tokens via a payment stream to the Solanium team, adjusted to accelerate tokens vested from June 28th 2022, until the present day.
If passed, the stream will be initiated directly from the Mean DAO Treasury Multisig in MeanFi.
account.name: Release undistributed Solanium.io advisory tokens

account.descriptionLink:
Summary 

Implement Payment Streams into Realms so any DAO can create proposals in the platform with a Payment Stream transaction.

Abstract

The aim of the proposal is to facilitate the use of the Payment Stream Protocol on the Realms Platform, so that any DAO or community can utilize it as part of their proposals as a type of transaction embedded to the passing of said proposal. This provides a great deal of visibility to the protocol, and a great tool to the Solana community in one same package. 

Forums:
https://next.meanfi.com/p/proposal-integration-of-payment-streaming-into-realms
account.name: Integration of the Payment Stream Protocol into the Realms Platform

account.descriptionLink: As every month, the compensation for the Motherators' role in keeping the DAO running and rules being followed!
account.name: Moderators' compensation for month of June

account.descriptionLink:

account.descriptionLink:
As a Play-Guild team, our main objective is to make the Mean DAO Community & Products a place where existing members want to keep coming back over and over again. Our primary focus is retention by increasing the engagement of existing members and users. In particular, related metrics are;

to increase active visitor count by up to 10% on monthly basis (Discord Engagement)

to increase the number of messages by up to 10% on monthly basis (Discord Engagement)

to increase the number of Mean DAO-related tweets by up to %10 on monthly basis (Twitter engagement) compared to the last epoch.

Detailed proposal in the Forum - https://next.meanfi.com/p/play-guild-q4-proposal
account.name: Play-Guild Q4 Proposal

account.descriptionLink:
Moderators play a vital role in Discord communities, and this is no different in Mean DAO. Upholding the values and commitment of a Mod Role requires an effort to be put forth. With the changes that have occurred in the past months in the ecosystem, Moderators have requested two things from the community: 
1. Non-active mods to be removed from such position. 
2. A raise in monthly Moderator payments to equate a total of $20 USD in MEAN tokens. 

The payment increase will see Mods be paid 700 MEAN monthly for Q1, and set for review in Q2.
account.name: Moderator Incentive Increase request

account.descriptionLink: Mean DAO has 8 moderators and they receive 700 $MEAN per month. This proposal is for executing September incentives.
account.name: Monthly Payment of Moderators

account.descriptionLink:
Abstract:
This is a proposal to delist MEAN from the MEXC exchange.

Details:
The MEAN token has been listed on MEXC since the beginning. MEXC was an early investor in Mean DAO and Payment Streaming Protocol. Recently, market makers on MEXC have raised concerns about the consolidation of account holders, which has reduced from around 1,000 to 62. This proposal suggests redirecting resources and liquidity from MEXC to Gate.io instead, to mitigate risks and optimize efficiency. If approved, the core team will request the delisting of MEAN token from MEXC and focus on deepening markets on Gate.io and Bitmart exchanges.
account.name: Delisting MEAN from MEXC

account.descriptionLink: Mean DAO has 8 moderators and they receive 700 $MEAN per month. This proposal is for executing September incentives.
account.name: Monthly Payment of Moderators

account.descriptionLink:
The focus of this proposal is to spin-off the MeanFi multisig team from Mean DAO into its own project called SuperSafe.

Our SuperSafe multisig has already become a critical infrastructure for companies and teams alike in Solana, and we want to take this to the next level.

We’d like to make SuperSafe a true community-owned project and standard, by launching the SZK token to govern the SuperSafe ecosystem and infrastructure through the establishment of an independent SuperSafe Foundation.

For additional information, join the conversation here: https://next.meanfi.com/p/mip-11-spin-off-supersafe-into-a-public-utility
account.name: MIP-11: Spin-off SuperSafe into a public utility

This proposal is for Q4 on the Membership and Product Support side of the DAO, led by Thikkor. This will include the funding for all projects on this quarter, and here is a list of the objectives to be tackled. 

For more information on how those objectives will be handled, please visit the following link: https://next.meanfi.com/p/head-of-membership-product-support-okrs-for-q4-thikkor

O1 - Shift community interest to be centered around the Payment Streaming Protocol

O2 - Create developer demand for our Payment Streaming Protocol

O3 - Increase the engagement of the DAO in matters of Governance (Realms)

Play-Guild is one the guilds of Mean DAO and its main objective is to make the Mean DAO Community & Products a place where existing members want to keep coming back to over and over again.

For October, we have six events waiting for your participation;

MEAN Quiz
